body_html: If the input matrix A is symmetric, changing A_ij, will also change A_ji, so we need to multiple the off-diagonal elements by 2. For more details including results on the generalized eigenvalue problem see this wiki article on Eigenvalue perturbation.
body_text: If the input matrix A is symmetric, changing A_ij, will also change A_ji, so we need to multiple the off-diagonal elements by 2. For more details including results on the generalized eigenvalue problem see this wiki article on Eigenvalue perturbation.
body: If the input matrix A is symmetric, changing A_ij, will also change A_ji, so we need to multiple the off-diagonal elements by 2. For more details including results on the generalized eigenvalue problem see this [wiki article on Eigenvalue perturbation](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eigenvalue_perturbation).
